main: ^“Hey sweetheart, I'm over here by the bar table”
^“Oh, why thank you sweetheart. So how is this gonna work?”
^“So I’m going to ask you some questions and we will have an honest conversation from there. I will be recording this.”
^“So, to jump right into it, how are you feeling about the asteroid situation?”
^“Honest ha… Well, what do I have to lose .”
^“I don’t care much about myself really, I care more about my people. They are my biggest priority.”
^“Have you heard of the troublemakers of this city?"
^"Yes the Emerald Mafia, but why do you ask?"
^"Well this bar is a front for the mafia's mischief, they call this place home."
^“But wait, it's called Sienna’s Bar… and that doesn’t answer my question…”
^“I’m the boss, sweetheart, of the Bar and the mafia gang. My people, although most of them ruffians and thugs, they are my family.”
^Mafia… I didn't think that you would be a criminal.
^That's an intense family, I can understand why it's weighing on you
^Damn mama, didn't think you were wild like that.

c-0: ^"You wanted honesty, don't judge me for giving to you."
c-1: ^"*tucks hair behind ear*" "It’s okay I’ll figure it out but thank you."
c-2: ^"*smirks* I have many sides to me, sweetheart…  *chuckles*"

afterFirstChoice: ^"How did you end up in this situation though?”
^“When Emerald City was still newly developing,my grandfather left Italy to live here and he basically became a loan shark to make ends meet.”
^“He grew a community like this and so became the Emerald Mafia.”
^“Oh wow so he really made something for himself”
^“He had 3 sons and taught them the in’s and out's of the business. After he passed his eldest son took over, that being my dad.”
^“As the eldest in the new generation, I was next in line. My dad built me this bar, as a gift for my handover, called it Sienna's place.”
^“He built it in our favourite place in the city.”
^So there is just a family of criminals…
^Oh so you’re the first woman in power.

c-0: ^"You’re really harping on that fact, I thought there was no judgement…"

afterSecondChoice: ^“So tell me why this is your favourite place in the city.”
^“Growing up he really valued ‘us’ time, given his work.  So we would come here for picnics, it was my favourite place in the city.”
^"For a mafia you guys are really sweet”
^“I mean we are still human, we still have hearts”
^“Actually it kinda breaks my heart, but i think i'm going to close the bar”
^“Oh no, why would you do that?
^“Well it's just me working now and I can't manage by myself. The business is suffering for it, so i feel like i have no choice”
^“No you can't let the legacy die like this, let me help you. I'm sure we can get it ready for customers again.”
^“Then maybe you can host one last good night for a farewell.”
^"Well then, if you're willing to help, I have some menial tasks that need to be done."
^"I can't do them because I have other matters to attend to."
^"Sure, no problem. Happy to lend a hand!"
^"Please see that they are finishished before closing time."
^Sienna has tasked you with some tasks in the form of mini games!
^Complete these tasks before the time runs out to improve your date outcome!
